channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Watering Down the SAT Weakens Meritocracy
item.description: If we want a society that truly rewards talent and effort, we must preserve and strengthen the tools that make upward mobility possible.

item.title: England Codifies A Culture Of Death
item.description: Women will now have more time to abort their children, and everyone will finally have a say in how and when they die.

item.description: Crew members from a Disney cruise ship saved a girl who fell overboard and her father who jumped in after her.
